item.title: Alternative Rural Broadband Solution
item.description:
For those living and working in rural areas, limited internet options can be a major problem. While major providers often only service cities, there are ways to stay connected without spending a fortune or waiting years for expanded infrastructure. Forget DSL or cable â€“ those are rare finds outside city limits. While universal telephone service guarantees basic phone lines (and thus, very slow dial-up internet), there’s a better option for fast, affordable internet: the existing cell phone network...

item.title: FREE HTC Wildfire S White For The Holidays
item.description:
The HTC Wildfire S, a stylish white smartphone available from T-Mobile, is a popular choice for the holidays. This sought-after Android phone can be yours for free, making the season even brighter. What makes the Wildfire S so appealing? It might be the way this smart device focuses on people, organizing communication by individuals instead of apps. Its multi-window browsing feature allows for efficient multitasking. The Wildfire S stands out for its compact size, measuring a mere 4...

item.title: The Samsung Epic 4G offers Epic Performance
item.description:
Imagine a smartphone so powerful it surpasses a netbook. Picture yourself declining WiFi because your cellular connection is faster. That’s the kind of speed the Samsung Epic 4G offers with its impressive 10+ Mbps download speeds, thanks to the Sprint WiMAX 4G network. You can even share your connection as a mobile hotspot for your other devices. Beyond speed, the Epic boasts a stunning Super AMOLED touchscreen display with near-HD quality and unmatched contrast...
